Class PlayerConfigPanel

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
    public class PlayerConfigPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    Used in the view to configure the Players.
    Author:
    Felix Bachmann
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • PlayerConfigPanel

        public PlayerConfigPanel​(ArenaConfigPanel arenaConfigPanel)
        Create a new instance. The arena config panel is needed as reference because the amount of players in the game (which then can be configured here) is determined by the ArenaI.getMaxPlayers() method.
        Parameters:
        arenaConfigPanel - the arena config panel

      • loadFromMaps

        private void loadFromMaps​(int playerCnt)
        Loads the values from the maps into the combo boxes. If there are no values for the player in the map, then the DEFAULT_VALUE is loaded.
        Parameters:
        playerCnt - the player count to load

      • setPlayerRange

        public void setPlayerRange​(int range)
        Sets the range for the player chooser combo box.
        Parameters:
        range - the new range

        public int getSpeed​(int playerId)
        Returns the speed for a player. Ids range from 1 to this#getPlayerCount()

        Returns:
